channel.title: debian on Og Maciel's Journal
channel.description: Recent content in debian on Og Maciel's Journal

item.title: Good Debian Server Setup HOWTO
item.description: Earlier this year OSNews published my article titled "Installing Debian Linux For The Faint Of Heart." Today I came across another article dealing with the same subject. Now, I know people have hammered these types of articles to death in the net but this one sounded worth the risk of mentioning. For one thing, it covers hardening your bare-bones Debian server which, IMHO should be worth looking at no matter what.
